price: Kuma bãbu kõwa daga Mutãnen Littafi,* fãce lalle yanã ĩmãni da shi a gabãnin mutuwarsa, kuma a Rãnar ¡iyãma yana kasancẽwa mai shaida, a kansu.
arabic: وَإِن مِّنۡ أَهۡلِ ٱلۡكِتَٰبِ إِلَّا لَيُؤۡمِنَنَّ بِهِۦ قَبۡلَ مَوۡتِهِۦۖ وَيَوۡمَ ٱلۡقِيَٰمَةِ يَكُونُ عَلَيۡهِمۡ شَهِيدٗا
footnotes: * An ce Mutãnen Littafi na zamanin Annabi Isa lalle suna imani da shi gabanin mutuwarsa cewa shi ba Allah ne ba, kuma ba ɗan Allah ne ba; kowannensu kamin ya mutu yana imani da cewa Isa Manzon A1lah ne, a lokacin da imanin ba ya amfanin sa. Allah Ya fi sani.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.
